thread.title: Traveling On A Container Ship Isn't A Half-Bad Way To Get Across The Atlantic
thread.title_full: Traveling On A Container Ship Isn't A Half-Bad Way To Get Across The Atlantic

title: Traveling On A Container Ship Isn't A Half-Bad Way To Get Across The Atlantic
text: 'IT'S LIKE THE SHIP IS DRUNK' Traveling On A Container Ship Isn't A Half-Bad Way To Get Across The Atlantic 6 diggs Curious Video Oceans This ship's living accommodations are dope. There's a gym, sauna and whirlpool. They'll even sing you happy birthday over the intercom. If you don't mind taking your sweet time and can canoodle your way on board, cargo travel seems like the way to go.
